utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Listen y’know what sir? For the last time, I don’t care what the computer says, we did not take a bag of Mashuga nuts from the mini-bar and we did not watch Dr. Do-Me-A-Little!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Joey uh, were you in our room last night?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. I was told the name of the movie would not appear on the bill!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi! We’re checking out of the bridal suite.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s right. I’m no longer a bride. I’ll never be a bride again. Now, I’m just someone’s wife!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I’m the happiest guy in the world! Oh honey, come on don’t be upset. We still have so much to look forward to!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah, right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We got the honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s not ‘til Thursday.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The wedding pictures?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They won’t be ready for weeks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not the disposable cameras from the tables.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s true! I knew I married you for a reason!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’ll tell you what, I will go get them developed and you can go home.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What? What did you take a picture of?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing! It was something.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay Ross has the cameras, has he checked out yet?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you joking? Check out is not ‘til noon and he has a good eleven minutes left.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross has never checked out of a room a minute before he had to.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, one time, when we were dating, uh we got a late checkout, he got so excited it was the best sex we ever had. Until y’know, he screamed out Radisson at the end.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, well I’m gonna get Ross, get the cameras, and get them developed. 32 Joe. You’re 32!

utterance.speaker: Front Desk Clerk
utterance.content: Here’s a copy of your bill.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh thanks. Champagne, strawberries…Oh my God! I can’t believe Chandler ordered porn on our wedding night!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s sad. Mashuga nut?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey. Soaps? Shampoos? Are you really taking all this stuff?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why not? It’s built into the price of the room.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah but you don’t need——What is this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thread!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Score! Where are the disposable cameras?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What disposable cameras?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The cameras? Remember last night I told you to take them?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No you didn’t.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! Remember? Right before we cut the cake, I went up to you and I said…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh yeah, you-you came up to me and asked if I could do you a favor, and my Uncle Murray came up to you and handed you a check. And then you said, "Why do they call it a check? Why not a Yugoslavian?" Yeah, then you did that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you don’t have the cameras?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. Sorry man.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So? What? What? They’re gone! Monica’s gonna freak!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I’m sure they’re still somewhere here in the hotel. I’ll-I’ll help you look for them.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: In-in three minutes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you gonna open the presents without Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! But, they’re callin’ out to me! I mean this little guy even crawled up into my lap. Oh come on, Chandler wouldn’t mind if I opened just one present! What do you think it is?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: A little mirror that when you look into it you see yourself as an old woman.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A tiny salt shaker!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh! My God! For tiny salt!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh wow! Okay. Well that was fun.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Good. Okay, I’m just gonna wait for Chandler to open the rest of them.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Whew. Although y’know, this is part of a salt and pepper set. I mean… I guess y’know it may just count as a half a present. What do you think?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well I guess it’s okay to open one more if it’s part of a set. Y’know, it’s probably this one.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Or this one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, how are you feelin’? Any morning sickness?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shh-shh-shh! The guys don’t know yet do they?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Joey and Ross don’t know anything and Chandler still thinks that Phoebe’s pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah that’s right Chandler does still think I’m pregnant. He hasn’t asked me how I’m feeling or offered to carry my bags. Boy, I feel bad for the woman who ends up with him. After you of course.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don’t worry I promise that you will only have to be pregnant for a few more hours, ‘cause I’m going to tell the father today.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, is it someone in this building? Is it that tall guy from the first floor?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ew! No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?! I think he’s cute.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well then you have his baby.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Believe me I’m trying.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow. Y’know it is so weird. I mean, you’re gonna tell this guy today and he has no idea what’s gonna happen.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. You’re just gonna knock on his door and change his life forever. You’re like Ed McMahon except without the big check, or the raw sexual magnetism.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Pretty big? It’s huge! God, this guy doesn’t have a clue! He’s just walking down the street thinking, ‘I had sex with Rachel Green. I rock!’ then bam! He’s a father and everything’s different.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well it’s only different if he wants it to be. I mean, I’m not gonna ask him for anything.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Then he still has this huge decision to make. Now he’s walking around thinking, ‘Do I want to be a dad?’ and then bam!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What was that bam?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t. He got…he-he-he-he’s hit by a bus.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Joey, what would you do if someone that you slept with told you that she was pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who called here? Did she sound blond? Huh? Did-did-did she have an accent? I gotta make a call! I shoulda never walked into that Sunglass Hut!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Joey! Joey! No, it’s not you! You didn’t get anybody pregnant!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. Why would you scare me like that? What the hell is going on? Is somebody pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah. That’s me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God Pheebs! You’re gonna have a baby?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes. Yes I am. Oh my God, I’m gonna have a baby!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa, wait a minute. Who’s the father?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You don’t know him. It’s not important. He wants nothing to do with me or the baby.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well who is this guy?! Huh? Who is he? ‘Cause I will track him down and kick his ass!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: David Lynn.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: David Lynn! David Lynn! David Lynn!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who’s David Lynn?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh some guy from my gym. A little annoying.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Did you find the cameras?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. Did you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! And that’s why I’m under the table. Celebrating.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I checked in the uh, lost and found, I talked to the manager, no-one’s turned them.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well this is great. Y’know, those cameras were the only thing that was gonna cheer Monica up today, she’s really depressed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Now you guys just got married, why is she so depressed?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All my energy is going into not asking that question. I can’t believe I screwed this up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry man. Here’s a thought. This is the same ballroom. There’s a band. There’s gonna be plenty of dressed up people.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you suggesting we dance our troubles away?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no-no, I’m saying we-we buy more of this at the gift shop, throw our tuxes back on, and take a few pictures. All we have to do is make sure not to get anybody else’s faces.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m just thinking about your new bride at home. Okay? Do-do you really want to start your life together by letting her down?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Marriage advice? Really?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m telling you, this looks exactly like your wedding! Aren’t these the same flowers?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know, Monica picked out the flowers.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What about the chairs?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She picked those out too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How about the place settings?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What did you do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was in charge of the cameras! Gift shop?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Ooh, did you do it yet?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not yet.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well what are you doing here? Are you about to do it? Is it Gunther?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Phoebe, it’s not Gunther.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank God, ‘cause that hair on a baby…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe the father is not here okay? I haven’t told him yet and I don’t think I can tell him at all now!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know, let me think. I was walking down the street thinking, ‘I’m gonna tell the father today’ and then bam!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bus?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, you! Phoebe you freaked me out. You kept saying how huge this all is!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well-well but it is huge.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, but I was just thinking about how huge this is for me. I didn’t even go to how huge this was going to be for the father.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re thinking about this way too much. Just tell him and get it over with. It’s like, it’s like ripping off this Band-Aid. Quick and painless, watch. Oh mother of…See?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh-ooh-ooh! Are we opening presents?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! No! I shouldn’t have even opened these! I mean I—Joey I am out of control!! Joey, you have to do me a favor. No matter what I say, no matter what I do, please do not let me open another present! Okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Give me one more.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh good, uh you’re here. Uh Pheebs? Listen uh sit down. I-I got something I want to say.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Umm, now uh… It’s a scary world out there, especially for a single mom. Y’know, now I always thought you and I had a special bond so… Phoebe Buffay, will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Joey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hell yeah! I’ll marry you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You can’t marry him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey lady, your day’s over! It’s my turn!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why?! Why can’t she marry me?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can and I will!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She’s not pregnant. It’s Rachel. Rachel’s the one who’s pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe I think he would notice if you didn’t have a baby in nine months!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now I can’t believe it! What? Rachel’s pregnant? Who’s the father?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh… I wonder if that dude.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There’s a dude?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who? Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: About a month ago this guy spent the night with Rachel, I didn’t see who it was but…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Was that story over?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The guy left this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! I know who the father is…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: People have got to finish their stories!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, excuse me? Could you take a picture of us?

utterance.speaker: Woman At The Wedding
utterance.content: Oh! Of course.

utterance.speaker: Man At The Wedding
utterance.content: Uh, would you take one of us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh… Yeah sure. Click!

utterance.speaker: Woman At The Wedding
utterance.content: It didn’t click.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I heard it. I heard it.

utterance.speaker: Man At The Wedding
utterance.content: But there was no flash.

utterance.speaker: Woman At The Wedding
utterance.content: Why won’t you take our picture?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah. I’ll take, I’ll take your picture.

utterance.speaker: Man At The Wedding
utterance.content: Uh, your finger was covering the lens.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who are you? Ansel Adams?! Get outta here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, I feel really bad about how I freaked you out before, so I called the father and asked him to meet you here so you can tell him. Go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Hey wait a minute! Phoebe, how do you even know who the father is?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I may play the fool at times, but I’m a little more than a pretty blond girl with an ass that won’t quit. I believe this belongs to the father of your baby.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God… Oh, he’s in there right now?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Now you can turn around or you can go in there and rip the Band-Aid off. What to you want to do?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, let’s rip!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, sorry. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Hey Rach.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why don’t you go up on stage. I’ll get a picture of you doing the speech.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Okay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Will the owner of a 1995 Buick LeSabre please see the front desk? Your car is about to be towed.

utterance.speaker: Anxious Wedding Guest
utterance.content: That’s my car!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A ’95 LeSabre?!

utterance.speaker: Anxious Wedding Guest
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A green LeSabre?

utterance.speaker: Anxious Wedding Guest
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry, I meant a blue LeSabre.

utterance.speaker: Anxious Wedding Guest
utterance.content: Yes! Green-blue!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well go! Go move it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, you ready for the last picture?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Get ready to run. Congratulations on your wedding.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: So, what’s this about?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel has something that she wants to tell you and umm, I believe that this is your red sweater.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: No. This is my red sweater.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no. Could I get anyone a coffee or…poison? No? Just for me? Okay.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: What’s going on Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing! Phoebe kinda made a mistake. But y’know you do wear that sweater a lot, are you involved in some kind of dare?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Y’know, I’m actually glad Phoebe called. I know we broke up because you thought I wasn’t mature enough, but I’ve really grown up and think we should get back together.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it’s just not the right time.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: It is the right time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: I’m ready for more.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Tag…

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Come on Rach, let’s give it another try.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m having a baby.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You can go.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t know how any of these got opened?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You opened them all?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! I know! I am a terrible person! I mean, Chandler is never going to trust me with anything ever again!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey! You got my parent’s gift!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. What is that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I don’t know. I think it does something to salami.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! How’d it go?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. What-what did Tag say?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Tag is not the father! And Joey knows now?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I do Rach. I do, and I so happy for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wow, you didn’t even try to unhook my bra!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So are you ever gonna tell whoever it is?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I will. I’m just not up for it tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Rach listen, no matter what this guy says I want you to know you’re not gonna be alone in this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen I uh… It’s a scary world out there especially if you’re a single mom. Y’know, I always felt like you and I have this-this special bond. Y’know? So, Rachel Green will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pheebs, give me the ring back!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Joey, oh you’re so sweet. You’re so-so sweet, honey. But I’m not, I’m not looking for a husband.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I understand.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now, if you will excuse me I am going to go and lie down.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t say that didn’t hurt. But I’ll take you back Joey Tribbiani.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh yeah. Pheebs, listen about that. I only offered…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! A Salami Buddy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There you go!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We’re back!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great! We’re hangin’ in the kitchen! Let’s stay in the kitchen!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s picture time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Now you are going to love these.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here’s a picture of Ross. And that’s me. And that’s me and Ross. Oh-ho, that is a picture of our first kiss as a married couple.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! That is a great picture!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! Oh and interesting because I found the cameras in one of our bags!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh, didn’t see that coming.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so this isn’t a picture of our first, but it is a picture of my first kiss with…with this lady. Which by the look on your face I’m sure you’ll remember. So we don’t need——There’s no need to have this picture. How about I take the real pictures and get them developed right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That would be a good idea.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. You opened all the presents without me?! I thought we were supposed to do that together!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You kissed another woman!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Call it even?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I’m gonna go get these in some water.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait you stole those from these people’s wedding?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no, I took them from the hotel lobby. Yeah, they think they can charge me for some dirty movie and a bag of Mashuga nuts, they got another think coming. Hey! My sweater! I’ve been looking for this for like a month!

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! How you doing?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Good! Good, long time no see.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Like your sweater.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hey, right back at ya.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Oh, it’s crazy about Rachel huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. She—Well, she’s one crazy lady?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: So whose is it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, I don’t some Italian guy. Come on, read your own label. See you later.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He is so weird.
